You can level-up your clan, using the following:
Lv. 1 - [SP: 30,000 / Adena: 650,000]
Lv. 2 - [SP: 150,000 / Adena: 2,500,000]
Lv. 3 - [SP: 500,000 / Item: Blood Mark]
Lv. 4 - [SP: 1,400,000 / Item: Proof of Alliance]
Lv. 5 - [SP: 3,500,000 / Item: Proof of Aspiration]
Get the Blood Mark by hunting the Blood Queen in Dragon Valley.
To get the Aliance Manifesto, see Sir Kristof Rodemai in the Town of Giran.
To get the Seal of Aspiration, see Sir Gustav Athebaldt in the Town of Oren.
